DOC.brief_summary: Use drug Milnacipran reduce ventricular lactate level process time complete complex task relative placebo .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Milnacipran Patients With Fibromyalgia
DOC.detailed_description: Patients Fibromyalgia show elevated ventricular lactate level measure via magnetic resonance spectroscopy ( MRS ) . Patients treat Milnacipran show normalization ventricular lactate level compare treat placebo , also show normalization increase latency respond complex reaction time probe compare treated placebo .
DOC.criteria: Female male subject fulfill American College Rheumatology 's case definition Fibromyalgia . 18 68 year age Pregnant try become pregnant Taking Serotonin Norepinephrine Reuptake Inhibitor ( SNRI ) already take milnacipran Patients indicate pain level less substantial despite best care History psychotic disorder history alcoholism drug abuse within 10 year intake determine psychiatric diagnostic interview Presence current depression determine psychiatric diagnostic interview Presence brain lesion MRI anatomical study
